title: スパークル (Kiwi no na wa | Your Name OST)
lyrics: -    Mada kono sekai wa boku wo kainarashitetai mitai da nozomi doori ii darou utsukushiku mogaku yo Tagai no sunadokei nagame nagara kisu wo shiyou yo "sayonara" kara ichi ban tooi basho de machi awaseyou    Tsui ni toki wa kita kinou made wa joshou no joshou de tobashiyomi de ii kara koko kara ga bokuda yo keiken to chishiki to kabi no haekakatta yuuki wo motte ima da katsutenai supiido de kimi no moto e daibu wo Madoromi no naka de namanurui koora ni koko de nai dokoka wo yume mita yo kyoushitsu no mado no soto ni densha ni yurare hakobareru asa ni Unmei da toka mirai tokatte koto ba ga dore dake te wo noba sou to to dokanai basho de bokura koi wo suru tokei no hari mo futa ri wo yoko meni minagara su sumu sonna sekai wo fu tari de iss hou iya, nan-shou demo Iki nuite ikou
